title: Just So You Know DTS-HD Master Audio 4.1 1080p
description: This is the demo track, Just So You Know, from Sony ACID Pro 7. Generally, we hear music in stereo format but this audio track is in DTS-HD Master Audio 5.1 surround sound. Well actually, DTS-HD Master Audio 4.1 surround sound because the vocals goes to the center speaker and I this is instrumental only. When vocal are applied to this track then it will be a genuine 5.1 surround sound song and not instrumental. Main vocals are sent to the center speaker, for creativity such as ad-libs can surround the audience. I vision this audio track in Dolby TrueHD 7.1 surround sound. I cannot find a Dolby TrueHD encoder for Windows and making this in DTS-HD Master Audio 7.1 is unjustly complicated and too expensive for my budget. But here it is, audio in surround sound utilizing all five speakers discreetly.
